definition: to sway/to waver/to rock/to rattle/to destabilize/to pose a challenge to
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Be not due on this problem any suspicion and oscillatory .
sentences.chinese: 在這個問題上是不應有任何懷疑和動搖的。

sentences.english: The maintaining power means that the property of an object has an unshakeable internal power.
sentences.chinese: 定力是指事物性質具有不可動搖的內力。

sentences.english: He's found out about the ruse, but his demands for an apartment haven't wavered.
sentences.chinese: 張炘煬識破了這個花招，沒有動搖自己的主張。

sentences.english: There's always hope, but hope is tempered — often swamped — by hard facts.
sentences.chinese: 希望常常有，但它總是被鐵的事實動搖甚至磨滅。

sentences.english: Confidence 'began to shake,' said a person with direct knowledge of the situation.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解具體情況的一位人士透露，信心開始發生了動搖。

sentences.english: Faced with complex and ever-changing society, do you shake off their own humility.
sentences.chinese: 面對複雜多變的社會，你是否動搖過自己的謙讓之心。

sentences.english: Being unshakable means not letting people and other situations get a reaction from you.
sentences.chinese: 變得不可動搖意味着別讓人和別的情況迫使你迴應。

sentences.english: Apply powder liberally as often as necessary by shaking powder into your hand and smoothing onto skin.
sentences.chinese: 撲粉寬鬆視需要經常動搖粉末到你的手和平滑到皮膚。

sentences.english: There will be times when you falter, almost invariably.
sentences.chinese: 你會有動搖的時候，或許一直如此。

sentences.english: YangJian heard in the heart to have a shake.
sentences.chinese: 楊堅聽得心中有了一絲動搖。

sentences.english: Losing money, as Graham noted, can also be psychologically unsettling.
sentences.chinese: 虧錢，如格雷厄姆所釋，也能從心理上動搖軍心。

sentences.english: With that overturned, the clan authority and the authority of the husband all begin to totter.
sentences.chinese: 它既被打翻，族權和夫權便一概跟着動搖起來。

sentences.english: Political crisis did not weaken this structure, as Haass says.
sentences.chinese: 正如哈斯所言，政治危機並沒有動搖這座建築。

sentences.english: He emphasized that Afghanistan unswervingly pursues the one-China policy.
sentences.chinese: 他強調阿毫不動搖地奉行一箇中國政策。

sentences.english: But as he watched the pyre, the archon softened.
sentences.chinese: 但當執政官望着柴堆的時候，他的內心動搖了。

sentences.english: It destabilises the club and the players and we can't do anything about it.
sentences.chinese: 這會使軍心動搖，不過我們對此也無能爲力。
